product_name: Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Merino Wool Leggings - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The comfortable Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Merino Wool leggings for toddlers are an essential layer of clothing for cold days of playing, hiking, snow sports and everyday use. Soft and warm merino wool naturally resists odor. Flatlock seams help eliminate chafing. With a UPF 39 rating, the Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 merino wool leggings provide very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: The comfortable Icebreaker Bodyfit 200 Merino Wool leggings for toddlers are an essential layer of clothing for cold days of playing, hiking, snow sports and everyday use.
